page.title: 09SERVICES IN BASSINGBOURN
page.content: There are quite a lot of services in our village. This chart shows how often some services occur. {====================================== {|SERVICE 2x 1x 1x fort at | {| day day week night random | {|}milk * {| {|}post * {| {|}paper * * {| {|}laundry * {| {|}wetfish * {| {|}fish/chip *{ | {|}parcels * {| {|}leaflets * {| {|}ices * {| {====================================== There is a public library & community centre at the village college (pg 10). There are 4 churches in Bassingbourn: the Parish Church of Ss Peter & Paul; the United Reformed Church; Christian Fellowship; R.C. at the Barracks.
